name: exult
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to express great pleasure or happiness, especially at someone else's defeat or failure: exult at They exulted at their victory.exult over Campaigners exulted over the ruling announced yesterday.exult in She seems to exult in her power.

to express great pleasure or happiness, esp. at your success or at someone else’s failure: He exulted in the publicity he received. exultant adjective us
